Articles.Content: I made the mistake of opening the debug window and then adding contracts from the contracts tab. Now I am getting WorldsFirst contracts and cannot clear them or turn them off. I have uninstalled KSP a couple of times now and reinstalled them and I am still getting the same contracts. They show up without me accepting them or anything and with every new career modes. Did I royally screw it up? The only thing I can think is that this setting is in the registry stuck somewhere.

Do you mean the "record" contract ? Like "Land 100km from KSC" or "Fly at 300m/s". If yes I believe it is intended that they appear at each new game. I can see them with Contract Window+ at the very start of a career without accepting any contract or tweak the debug menu.

Yes. Those are the contracts I am talking about. I thought it was a bug or something because in the past you had to select each contract. I went ahead and wiped my computer and reinstalled KSP and there they are again.
